## Conference Poster & Talks

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: asis

library(yaml)

# --- helpers ----
nz <- function(x, default = "") {
  if (is.null(x) || length(x) == 0 || (is.character(x) && identical(x, ""))) default else x
}
is_true <- function(x) {
  isTRUE(x) || identical(tolower(as.character(x)), "true") ||
    identical(tolower(as.character(x)), "yes") || identical(x, 1)
}

# --- read yaml ----
cv <- yaml::read_yaml("_data/talks.yaml")
conferences <- cv$conferences

format_conference <- function(talk) {
  author <- nz(talk$author)
  year   <- nz(talk$year)
  month  <- nz(talk$month)
  title  <- nz(talk$title)
  conf   <- nz(talk$conf)
  place  <- nz(talk$place)

  # date part: (YEAR, MONTH) or just (YEAR)
  date_part <- if (month != "") sprintf("(%s, %s).", year, month) else sprintf("(%s).", year)

  # core line
  line <- sprintf('%s %s <em>%s</em>.', author, date_part, title)

  if (is_true(talk$isposter)) {
    line <- paste0(
      line, " Poster presented ",
      if (is_true(talk$isvirtual)) "(virtually) " else "",
      "at ", conf, "."
    )
  }
  if (is_true(talk$istalk)) {
    line <- paste0(
      line, " Talk given ",
      if (is_true(talk$isvirtual)) "(virtually) " else "",
      "at ", conf, "."
    )
  }
  if (place != "") line <- paste0(line, " ", place, ".")

  # links
  links <- c()
  if (!is.null(talk$abs)    && talk$abs    != "") links <- c(links, sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">[abstract]</a>', talk$abs))
  if (!is.null(talk$ho)     && talk$ho     != "") links <- c(links, sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">[handout]</a>', talk$ho))
  if (!is.null(talk$slide)  && talk$slide  != "") links <- c(links, sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">[slides]</a>', talk$slide))
  if (!is.null(talk$poster) && talk$poster != "") links <- c(links, sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">[poster]</a>', talk$poster))

  if (length(links) > 0) line <- paste(line, paste(links, collapse = " "))

  line
}

# build HTML with classes for styling
out <- vapply(seq_along(conferences), function(i) {
  item <- format_conference(conferences[[i]])
  sprintf(
    '<div class="ref-item"><span class="ref-num">[%d]</span><span class="ref-text">%s</span></div>',
    i, item
  )
}, character(1))

cat(paste(out, collapse = "\n"))
```
